word_mean: 〔复serums或sera〕浆液：指任何体液中与有形成份分离的透明部分
血清：血液凝固中与血凝块和细胞成份分离的透明液
免疫血清：已接种细菌或其毒素的动物(即免疫动物)的血清，用做被动免疫
指抗血清(antiserum)，抗毒素(antitoxin)或抗蛇毒素(antivenin)

sentence.Network_en: They are determining the serum - protein and cholesterol levels.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正在测定血清蛋白和胆固醇的浓度.

sentence.Network_cn: 一般公众均可获得血清.

sentence.Network_en: The only available hyperimmune serum was of equine origin.
sentence.Network_cn: 唯一可得到的超免疫血清来源于马.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin, literally whey'

entry.def: A serum is a liquid that is injected into someone's blood to protect them against a poison or disease.
Serum is the watery, pale yellow part of blood.

means.word_mean: 1. watery fluid of the blood that resembles plasma but contains fibrinogen
